description.value:
Wondrous Item, Rare
These mirrors come in linked sets of two to five mirrors. By spending a 1st-level spell slot, you can open a portal between any two linked mirrors for 15 minutes, during which time anyone can pass through it in either direction.
In addition, while looking into the mirror, your reflection reveals hints at any secrets you hold.
